meanings.definition: The quality or state of being humble.
meanings.sent1: Her humility shone through as she quietly helped others without seeking recognition.
meanings.sent2: His humility was evident in the way he always listened to others and never boasted about his own accomplishments.
meanings.sent3: Despite being the star of the show, her humility made her blend in with the rest of the cast.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of noise and self-promotion, her humility was a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's humility inspired her students to be kind and considerate towards one another.

meanings.definition: A modest or low view of one's own importance.
meanings.sent1: His humility prevented him from bragging about his achievements, no matter how impressive they were.
meanings.sent2: She showed humility by always putting others' needs before her own and never seeking the spotlight.
meanings.sent3: Despite his humility, he couldn't help but blush when praised for his hard work.
meanings.sent4: Her humility was like a gentle breeze, quietly reminding everyone to stay grounded and focused on what truly matters.
meanings.sent5: The CEO's humility surprised everyone, as he never acted superior to his employees despite his success.
